mapper.select: select b_no, b_title, b_content, b_date, b_status, b_writer, b_type from board order by b_no desc
select b_no, b_type, b_title, b_content, b_date, b_count, b_status, b_first, b_writer, m_nick from board join member on (b_writer = m_id) where b_status='Y' and b_type=#{bType} order by b_first desc
select b_no, b_title, b_content, b_date, b_status, b_writer, b_type from board
select count(*) from board where b_status='Y'
select m_id, m_pwd, m_nick, m_status, m_admin, m_email from member order by m_email desc
select count(*) from member where m_status ='N'
select m_id, m_pwd, m_nick, m_status, m_admin, m_email from member where m_sadmin ='N'
select p_no, p_type, p_title, p_content, p_date, p_status, p_bno, p_receiver, p_reporter, p_bpage, p_mnick from report order by p_no desc

select p_no, p_type, p_title, p_content, p_date, p_status, p_bno, p_receiver, p_reporter, p_bpage, p_mnick from report left join member on (p_reporter = m_id) where (p_type= 3 or p_type= 4 or p_type= 5 or p_type=6) and p_status='Y' order by p_no desc

select p_no, p_type, p_title, p_content, p_date, p_status, p_bno, p_receiver, p_reporter, p_bpage, p_mnick from report
where (p_type= 1 or p_type= 2) and p_status='Y' order by p_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into report values (seq_rno.nextval, #{pType}, #{pTitle}, #{pContent}, sysdate, default, #{pBno}, #{pReceiver}, #{pReporter}, #{pBpage}, #{pMnick}, #{pBtype})
mapper.select: select count(*) from report where p_status='Y'
select p_no, p_type, p_title, p_content, p_date, p_status, p_bno, p_receiver, p_reporter, m_nick from report left join member on (p_reporter = m_id) where p_no = #{pNo}
